title: 4 Father's Day Lotto luck for Rotorua
content:
A Lotto ticket sold in Rotorua has won $10,000. 

The winning ticket was sold at the Lucky Lotto Shop on Tutanekai St and was part of the Father's Day promotion drawn last night. 

According to NZ Lotto, the prize had not been claimed. 

An Eastern Bay ticket also won a new Ford Ranger. 

It was sold at the Halfway Store in Whakatane and is yet to be claimed. 

- Rotorua Daily Post
